{{cpp/chrono/year_month/title|ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

检查存储于此对象的 {{tt|year}} 和 {{tt|month}} 值是否均合法。

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|year().ok() &amp;&amp; month().ok()}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
using namespace std::chrono_literals;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::year_month ym1{3030y, std::chrono::July};
    static_assert(ym1.ok());

    constexpr std::chrono::year_month ym2{std::chrono::year(2020)/16};
    static_assert(!ym2.ok());
}
}}
